Wed, 10 Jul 2024 06:00:00 +0000 A jury in the High Court at Hamilton has begun its deliberations over whether a woman and a young man are guilty of Taku Manu Paul's murder, by hitting him with a car, in Te Puke at Christmas, 2022.
